about_the_game:
Dippy & Chippy is a thrilling two-player co-opetition promoting the game that takes you on an epic adventure through a world filled with danger and excitement. In this action-packed game, you'll take control of a two-headed ogre and work together with your partner to fight your way through hordes of skeletons and other monsters.

Using a single controller, you and your partner must coordinate your movements and attacks to overcome the challenges that lie ahead. With intuitive controls and challenging gameplay, Dippy & Chippy is perfect for gamers of all skill levels.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a variety of environments and enemies, each with its own unique challenges and dangers. You'll need to stay alert and use all your skills to survive.

Featuring stunning graphics and an immersive soundtrack, Dippy & Chippy is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. So grab a friend and get ready for an unforgettable adventure in this exciting and engaging game.

Key Features

  • Test your bond! - 2 players on a single controller responsible for 1 ogre. Co-ordinate, and communicate to move and kill enemies.

  • Immersive feedback - Each element has curated VFX and SFX feedback to keep 2 players engaged and comfortable

  • Variety of challenges - Each level brings new enemies/traps and compelling coordination from the players!

  • Players from all skill levels! - Dippy & Chippy can be played with players with vastly different skill gaps without being unfair.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Resolution 1080p, 16:9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or up
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Resolution 1080p, 16:9

short_description: Join forces with your best friend and embark on a thrilling adventure as the two-headed ogre duo, Dippy & Chippy, in the ultimate two-player couch coop game of exploring dungeons and discovering treasures!
